value.title: Sort Legend in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Tips and Tricks Video. This is a short and sweet video demonstrating the functionality to apply Sort on Legend values in Power BI. We can now adjust the sort direction for items in our legends! This will also help to reorder some of the data in visuals like stacked column charts,

value.title: Use Page Navigation Action for Button to Navigate from One Page to Another in Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, about newly introduced action type for buttons which is ‚ÄúPage Navigation‚Äù. value.title: 3 ways to try Power BI

value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway
value.excerpt: This video was based on a call I had last week relating to troubleshooting connectivity to a SQL Server named instance from the Power BI gateway. This is really my thought process for how I handle connection errors to a data source from any application.    LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: A quick look at the new Power BI Report Builder

value.title: Are you following best practices with Azure Synapse Analytics?

value.title: Connect from Power BI Mobile to SSRS using OAuth
value.excerpt: Connect from Power BI Mobile to SSRS using OAuth  In this video, I show you how to configure Active Directory Federated Services (ADFS) and the Web Application Proxy (WAP) role, in Windows 2016, so that you can connect from Power BI mobile to SQL Server Reporting Services using OAuth.  The ADFS and WAP

value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files. This is a great technique if you don't want to retype all of the conditional items in the dialog in Power BI.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com
